get.summary: Finds a show by external id.

parameters.name: id_type
parameters.description: the type of id being searched on.

get.summary: Retrieve search results for movies and shows based on title matching.
get.description: Performs a typo-tolerant fuzzy search by title, with ordering weighted by popularity. If all_services is true, no service restriction will be applied, Otherwise filters via calling applications' configured services. Additional service filtering via service query string params can further restrict content. A maximum of 75 results will be returned.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Service Group Identifiers to filter by

parameters.name: all_services
parameters.description: When true, query is not bound by application's available service groups.

get.summary: Retrieve browse pages of: movies, or shows, or both.
get.description: Returns content filtered by type. If all_services is true, no service restriction will be applied, Otherwise filters via calling applications' configured services. Additional service filtering via service query string params can further restrict content. Does not allow fetching beyond the 500th item via skip/take. Ordering is controlled by order_by parameter. Allowed values are popular and trending.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of items to take.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Indicates how browsing will be ordered

parameters.name: all_services
parameters.description: When true, query is not bound by application's available service groups.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Service Group Identifiers to filter by.

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: The genre identifiers to filter by.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag identifiers to filter by

parameters.name: genre_match
parameters.description:
Controls if all the genres provided must exist on the content or if any of them is enough.
(Default: `PermitAny`)

parameters.name: tag_match
parameters.description:
Controls if all the tags provided must exist on the content or if any of them is enough.
(Default: `PermitAny`)

get.summary: Gets the intent and/or deeplink for the requested movie
get.description: Gets the TV deeplink and/or the user intent for the requested movie on the specified service, TV platform, and region.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: OPTIONAL: The region id. Supported values: us

get.summary: Gets the intent and/or deeplink for the requested episode
get.description: Gets the TV deeplink and/or the user intent for the requested episode on the specified service, TV platform, and region.

parameters.name: region_id
parameters.description: OPTIONAL: The region id. Supported values: us
